metadata.title: The Lion Catches a Rabbit With Its Full Strength; the Crab Catches a Phoenix With a Pizza Cutter

tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over avatars. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of a red-bricked town. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
A ninja runs at night through the ruins.
Ether Reactor, Operations Unit, Golden Crystal sphere, Idols
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in town
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. In Nephilim Hollow, Rust and Mold stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
In Nephilim Hollow, Sunraku stares up. He dissapears. Kingfisher and Crimson Twinewing fly around and fight. Rust screams.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
The Golden Crystal scorpion spreads its pincers.
A blue haired ninja girl makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at a giant mountain of metal trash.
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears a mask and holds crystal arm guns.
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
In the lobby, spectators watch explosions with arms raised.
In the city, Twinewing hovers over a cloud of black smoke.
The guillotine arm appears out of a crackle of lightning and closes around Twinewing's arm.
Text, 33, The Lion Catches a Rabbit With Its Full Strength; the Crab Catches a Phoenix With a Pizza Cutter
Twinewing's severed right arm falls to the ground.
Spectators watch
He goes transparent.
Mold opens dialogs on his tablet.
Mold looks up. Twinewing kneels on a nearby roof.
She leaps off the roof, summersaults, and lands on the ground.
Fiddler switch to anti grav boots and floats, circling Twinewing. She watches his dust trail.
The claw emerges over her shoulder. She spins and roundhouse kicks his pincer off his body.
Fiddler's severed right arm falls to the ground.
The nephilims stare at each other, sparks shooting from their missing right arms.
Super Ballman grits his teeth.
Her damaged wing.
He shoots a net
She dodges right, avoiding the net.
Remodeler circular saw
He appears in front of her, reveals circular saws on his head, and head butts her.
Spectators gape.
The saw cuts through her torso.
Mold stares.
A sword pierces Fiddler's body.
They crash
The saw continues to run. Twinewing convulses, and the Nephilim explodes.
Super Ballman's mouth hangs open.
The smoke parts. Fiddler stands.
The crowd jumps and cheers.
Winner, Fiddler Crab
Sunraku appears on the street.
Rust appears behind him.
Spectators appear.
Mold looks up
Rust narrows her eyes.
She grabs his shoulders.
Sunraku, Rust, and Mold appear on a rooftop.
Pencilgon and Katzo smile evilly
She looks away
He gives a thumbs up. Her eyes shimmer. Mold looks at her.
She hides her eyes behind her bangs.
Her shoulders quiver.
She clenches her fist
She smiles
She opens a dialog and clicks several buttons.
A large, gray and silver mecha appears behind her.
It has a claw and spear on the right, a double barreled gun on the left, and spikes coming out of its legs.
Sunraku sweats.
Fiddler Crab appears
Mold smiles.
Rust smiles.
Dialog, Rust has challenged you
A dialog appears in front of Mold
He disappears
Sunraku puts a hand on Fiddler Crab, and disappears.
Rust has a hand on Ashen Antimony. She disappears.
The nephilims stare at each other. The spectators cheer.
More spectators join the lobby.
Her eyes shine. She leaps forward, her melee claw outstretched.
Fiddler Crab raises his arms and leaps towards her.
Through Rakuro's bedroom window, fluffy summer clouds float across the blue sky.
Rakuro sits up and removes his goggles.
He lies back in bed. The case for Nephilim Hollow, class A, lies on the floor.
Rabbit shaped bubbles float across a gray blue sky
At the Palace of Rabituza, Emul blows bubbles while sitting on the verandah.
She pulls out a pocket watch.
Feet wearing waraji, straw sandals, walks along the verandah.
A tall white rabbit wearing samurai armor
A woman with blue hair and green eyes wears a ninja outfit. She removes a fox mask and smiles.

Post-episode footnote: In Japanese, Rust's nephilim is spelled NiRiShiHaiHan. This is a 4 character term to mean a choice between mutually exclusive options, which is also translated into the philosophical term antinomy. The 4-character yojijukugo term is properly spelled with the characters for 2, law, reverse, opposite. However, Rust's spelling replaces the character back, pronounced "hai", with the character for gray, also pronounced "hai". Note that the Nephilim, Ashen Antimony, uses the word for anitmony, the silver metal, not antinomy, the Kantian principle of contradictory laws.
